This could get fixed through a part 2 tho. For example:
- All three characters know that the main character couldn't stay as a maid permanently because his father would return.
- Toyoko fabricates a story about mc(main character) being on some kind of educational trips or so.
- During that time Toyoko tries to fake the inheritance list somehow & tries to become interesting enough for her master to become more than just a head maid.~
- Accident happened or father gives up all his belongings for some reason, Toyoko owns the mansion and all maids now. (before that mc gets a bit brainwashed to only feel disgust towards his father)
- Toyoko is now Mistress and makes sure mc stays as a maid/slave 1/2
